title: Citizen Kane
description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud'.

title: The Maltese Falcon
description: Private detective Sam Spade gets drawn into a deadly pursuit of a bejeweled falcon statuette by three unscrupulous criminals and a femme fatale.

title: How Green Was My Valley
description: At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans raise coal-mining sons and hope their youngest will find a better life.

title: Sullivan's Travels
description: A naive Hollywood director masquerades as a hobo to do research for a serious film about the poor, but gets much more than he bargained for.

title: Dumbo
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

title: The Lady Eve
description: A trio of classy card sharks targets the socially awkward heir to a brewery fortune on an ocean liner.

title: Sergeant York
description: A hillbilly sharpshooter becomes one of the most celebrated American heroes of the First World War when he single-handedly attacks a German position.

title: The Wolf Man
description: Larry Talbot returns to his father's estate in Wales and meets a gypsy woman who tells him about the curse of the werewolf.

title: Suspicion
description: A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman, and soon begins to suspect him of planning to murder her.

title: High Sierra
description: After being released from prison, notorious thief Roy Earle is hired by his old boss to help a group of inexperienced criminals rob a resort hotel.

title: Ball of Fire
description: A group of professors working on a new encyclopedia encounter a mouthy nightclub singer who is wanted by the police to help bring down her mobster lover.

title: Meet John Doe
description: A man needing money agrees to impersonate a nonexistent person who said he'd be committing suicide as a protest, and a political movement begins.

title: The Little Foxes
description: The ruthless, money-grubbing Hubbard clan lives in, and poisons, their part of the Deep South at the turn of the twentieth century.

title: Here Comes Mr. Jordan
description: A boxer, mistakenly taken to heaven before his time, is given a second chance at life in the body of a murdered millionaire.

title: Penny Serenade
description: A couple's big dreams give way to a life full of unexpected sadness and unexpected joy.

title: The Devil and Daniel Webster
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic Picture
description: A poor farmer sells his soul to the Devil in exchange for seven years of good luck, but when the contract is up, he asks the orator Daniel Webster to defend him.

title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
description: Dr. Jekyll allows his dark side to run wild when he drinks a potion that transforms him into the evil Mr. Hyde.

title: 49th Parallel
description: The crew of a stranded German U-boat tries to evade capture in Canada during World War II.

title: Man Hunt
description: A British hunter trying to assassinate Hitler is caught, tortured, and left for dead, but he escapes back to London to be hunted by agents of the Gestapo.

title: Buck Privates
description: Two sidewalk salesmen enlist in the army to avoid the police, only to find their drill sergeant is the very officer who was chasing them.

title: That Hamilton Woman
description: The story of the romance between Lord Admiral Nelson and Lady Emma Hamilton during the Napoleonic Wars.

title: The Strawberry Blonde
description: A dentist recounts his time in turn-of-the-century New York, specifically his rivalry with a crook for the affections of a beautiful strawberry blonde.

title: Hellzapoppin'
description: A projectionist runs a movie for an audience in which the characters in the film step out of the screen and interact with the real world.

title: Never Give a Sucker an Even Break
description: W.C. Fields plays a version of himself, attempting to sell a bizarre script to a movie studio while dealing with his niece and various eccentrics.

title: They Died with Their Boots On
description: A highly fictionalized account of the life of General George Armstrong Custer, from his days at West Point to his death at the Battle of the Little Bighorn.

title: Blood and Sand
description: An illiterate peasant rises to fame as a matador, only to be corrupted by his success and a seductive aristocrat.

title: Blossoms in the Dust
description: Edna Gladney, having lost her own child, dedicates her life to helping orphaned children find homes and removing the stigma of illegitimacy.

title: A Woman's Face
description: A facially scarred blackmailer undergoes plastic surgery and is given a new lease on life, but her past comes back to haunt her.

title: Ziegfeld Girl
description: The lives of three beautiful women are changed forever when they are recruited to be Ziegfeld Girls on Broadway.

title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
description: A bickering couple discovers that their marriage was never legal due to a technicality, leading to a series of comedic misunderstandings.

title: Hold Back the Dawn
description: A Romanian gigolo stranded in Mexico marries a shy American schoolteacher to gain entry into the United States, but finds himself falling in love with her.

title: Western Union
description: An outlaw joins the team laying the telegraph line across the West, trying to go straight despite his past catching up with him.

title: Love Crazy
description: To prevent his wife from divorcing him, an architect pretends to be insane, leading to a series of chaotic events.

title: Honky Tonk
description: A con man and a judge's daughter marry after a drunken night, leading to complications when he becomes the boss of a western town.

title: The Sea Wolf
description: Three fugitives from the law are picked up by a seal-hunting ship captained by the brutal Wolf Larsen.

title: Swamp Water
description: A trapper enters the Okefenokee Swamp to find his lost dog and discovers a fugitive who has been hiding there for years.

title: H.M. Pulham, Esq.
description: A wealthy Boston businessman looks back on his life and his brief, passionate affair with an independent woman in New York City.

title: Babes on Broadway
description: A group of talented young performers try to get their big break on Broadway by staging their own show to help poor children.

title: The Reluctant Dragon
description: Humorist Robert Benchley wanders through the Walt Disney Studios, uncovering the secrets of animation while trying to sell a story idea.

title: I Wake Up Screaming
description: A promoter turns a waitress into a movie star, but when her sister is murdered, he becomes the prime suspect of a sinister detective.

title: The Shepherd of the Hills
description: A moonshiner vows revenge on the father who abandoned his family, unaware that a stranger who has arrived in the Ozarks is that very man.

title: Sun Valley Serenade
description: A band's publicity stunt involves adopting a war refugee, who turns out to be a beautiful Norwegian woman, leading to romance on the ski slopes.
